description.full: Show off your style and win the FIA WORLD RALLY CHAMPIONSHIP 2013 (official game) season! - A simulation unrivalled for its realism - An incredibly authentic and immersive career mode - The official 2013 FIA World Rally Championship videogame - Online multiplayer mode for up to 16 players - 65 cars, 78 routes, 13 countries - All weather conditions and road surfaces
description.short: Show off your style and win the FIA WORLD RALLY CHAMPIONSHIP 2013 (official game) season! - A simulation unrivalled for its realism - An incredibly authentic and immersive career mode - The official 2013 FIA World Rally Championship videogame - Online multiplayer mode for up to 16 players - 65 cars, 78 routes, 13 countries - All weather conditions and road surfaces
